args.desc: - ID of the model to train

args.name: rewardAmount
args.desc: - Amount to allocate for participant rewards

args.desc: - Amount participant contributes for training

args.name: sessionId
args.desc: - ID of the training session

args.name: participant
args.desc: - Participant account to reward

args.desc: - Share of total reward to distribute

args.name: modelId
args.desc: - ID of the model to update

args.name: status
args.desc: - New status (1 for active, 0 for inactive)

args.desc: - Amount to withdraw

args.desc: - ID of the model to query

returns.desc: Model price if model exists and is active
